title: Heals
body: Was just wondering if I purchase both mikaels and ardent do i get a 30% increase in heals or just the flat 15%

replies.body: Last time I checked it stacked, a unique passive is per item(unless it has a name) so it does stack but not 2 ardents bc its unique to the item, so if you had a forbidden idol/mikaels and ardent its about 40% with the keystone is goes up to 50%, unless they changed it in which case their wording is wrong(which riot does mess up ALOT) just a heads up, a unique name is like a sheen/trinity force where it says "unique passive - spellblade" in which case only one would work, so to recap, yes they do stack :)

A good example of this is in Twisted tree line the old Van Damns pillager used to have a bleed unique passive, but didnt ahve a name so you could get the item that builds into it with the same passive and bleed for like 210% of your ad on crits :)

Unique passives don't stack, but we all wish they could.
I wish Unique actives 'stacked'. 6 Zhonyas would equal 15 seconds of invulnerability (2.5 x 6)
they are seperate items, so they do stack, they dont have a common name to refer to
You might want to check up  on an official website, but i think i heard in patch notes that ardent and mikaels do stack. Unlikely it is, but you might want to check up on it
